original: For over 10 years, Fly High Pizza Pie has been bringing smiles to the faces of hungry customers across Liberty City. A family-owned business, we use only the freshest home-grown ingredients and pride ourselves on high-grade quality and discreet, speedy service.
translated: 过去10年中，高飞披萨饼为自由城各地的饥饿顾客送去了笑容。自家生意，我们只用最新鲜的自种食材，并提供引以为傲的高品质、高保密、高速度服务。

original: Why buy second-rate pizza from a shady street vendor when you can get the best stuff in town delivered straight to your door?! As soon as you catch your first whiff of a Fly High pizza, we guarantee you will never buy from anywhere else again. The finest herbs on the East Coast are but a phone call away. The best way to relax at the end of a hard day is with a Fly High Pizza Pie. Order now!
translated: 明明有人能送货上门，又何必去路边小摊买次品披萨呢？！只要闻到过高飞披萨饼的味道，你就再也不会选择其他披萨了。只要一个电话，东海岸最好的草就能上门。辛苦一天后最好的放松，就是高飞披萨饼。赶快订购吧！

original: Cash only. Not for re-sale. Please have the money ready when the delivery guy arrives and keep your hands where he can see them. We don't barter. Please tip.
translated: 只收现金，禁止倒卖。请在配送员上门之前备好现金，把手放在配送员看得见的地方。拒绝以物易物，请付小费。
让你忘记自己的第一次！

original: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, eggplant, beetroot, red onion.
translated: 番茄沙司、马苏里拉奶酪、意式香肠、茄子、甜菜根、紫洋葱。

original: You'll smell it two blocks away!
translated: 两条马路之外都能闻到味道！

original: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, chicken, yellow peppers, pineapple.
translated: 番茄沙司、马苏里拉奶酪、切达干酪、鸡肉、黄辣椒、菠萝。

original: You won't want to move after this!
translated: 吃了以后包你不想动弹！

original: Olive oil and garlic sauce, mozzarella cheese, garlic, artichoke hearts, and topped with goat cheese.
translated: 大蒜橄榄油酱、马苏里拉奶酪、大蒜、菜心、山羊奶酪。

original: Get ready for some sticky fingers!
Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, chorizo, sun-dried tomatoes, caramelized onions.
translated: 番茄沙司、马苏里拉奶酪、西班牙腊肠、番茄干、焦糖洋葱。

original: It will make you see things differently!
Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, gold tops, blue meanies, liberty caps and fresh herbs.
translated: 番茄沙司、马苏里拉奶酪、古巴裸盖菇、暗蓝斑褶菇、半针裸盖菇、新鲜药草。

original: The 4:20 special - half-price slices after school!
The Wake n' Bake special - 15% off all pizzas ordered before
translated: 早起一支烟特惠－10点之前全场披萨八五折！

original: If you like a bit of extra kick, why not order a Power Crust Pizza, dusted with our special seasoning? Warning: can cause psychotic behavior.
translated: 如果你想来点猛的，何不试试撒有季节菜品的强力表壳披萨？警告：可能引起精神病行为。

original: - Don't let cottonmouth get the better of you!
Sprunk, E-Cola and Orang-O-Tang in one-liter and two-liter bottles (many uses for these after you are finished!)
translated: 一升装和两升装的霜碧、易可乐、橙汁汽水 (瓶子留着，吸完还能用)

original: - Sometimes you don't want a whole slice. Fly High's nuggets are the perfect snack-size order for people on a budget.
translated: －有时一整片太多。高飞的小块披萨是手头紧张的人的完美选择。

original: - Pre-rolled pizzas for one! No cutlery required! Cheap, convenient and ready to choke down!
translated: －包起来的披萨！无需餐具！便宜、便利、一口吞下！

original: Tell us the type of pizza you want and let us know the quantity, e.g.
translated: 告诉我们你想要的披萨口味和数量。例：

original: Please mention whether you need napkins (standard or king-size). Pizzas can be delivered in aluminum foil or vacuum sealed plastic bags.
translated: 记得说明是否需要餐巾 (标准号/特大号)。可选择铝箔纸包装或塑料真空包装。

original: We find that at least half of our customers have problems remembering their phone number and address. If you can write these down before calling, it will save us all a lot of time and confusion.
translated: 我们发现顾客中至少有一半的人记不住自己的手机号和住址。如果你能在下单之前写下这些信息，大家都能省下很多时间。

original: Runners wanted! Excellent commission structure. Must be inconspicuous and comfortable with violence. Call for rigorous background check.
translated: 招募运货员！高提成。要求外貌低调，能够适应暴力。联系我们进行严格的背景调查。
